languages.text: Изысканное кольцо-аугмент, внутри которого скрывается тончайший шип-лезвие. В умелых руках эта вещь может стать смертоносным оружием.

traits.locale_text: Изысканное кольцо-аугмент, внутри которого скрывается тончайший шип-лезвие. В умелых руках эта вещь может стать смертоносным оружием.

languages.text: An exquisite ring augmetic that conceals the tiniest thorn-like blade within. Such an accessory could be a lethal weapon in the right hands.
languages.original_text: Изысканное кольцо-аугмент, внутри которого скрывается тончайший шип-лезвие. В умелых руках эта вещь может стать смертоносным оружием.

traits.locale_text: An exquisite ring augmetic that conceals the tiniest thorn-like blade within. Such an accessory is sure to become a lethal weapon in skilled hands.
An exquisite ring augmetic that conceals the tiniest thorn-like blade within. Such an accessory is sure to become a lethal weapon in skilled hands.
An exquisite ring augmetic that conceals the tiniest thorn-like blade within. Such an accessory is sure to become a lethal weapon if used properly.
An exquisite ring augmetic that conceals the tiniest thorn-like blade within. Such an accessory is sure to become a lethal weapon if used properly.
An exquisite ring augmetic that conceals the tiniest thorn-like blade within. Such an accessory could be a lethal weapon in the right hands.
An exquisite ring augmetic that conceals the tiniest thorn-like blade within. Such an accessory could be a lethal weapon in the right hands.

languages.text: 極小さなとげのような刃が内側に仕込まれた、優美な指輪型オーグメティック。こうしたアクセサリは、正しい手に渡れば、相手を死に至らしめる武器になり得る。
languages.original_text: An exquisite ring augmetic that conceals the tiniest thorn-like blade within. Such an accessory could be a lethal weapon in the right hands.

traits.locale_text: 極小さなとげのような刃が内側に仕込まれた、優美な指輪型オーグメティック。こうしたアクセサリは、正しい手に渡れば、相手を死に至らしめる武器になり得る。

languages.text: 一枚精巧的植入物戒指，其中隐藏着细小锋利的尖刺。只要使用得当，这枚小小的戒指可以成为夺人性命的武器。
languages.original_text: An exquisite ring augmetic that conceals the tiniest thorn-like blade within. Such an accessory could be a lethal weapon in the right hands.

traits.locale_text: 一枚精巧的植入物戒指，其中隐藏着细小锋利的尖刺。只要使用得当，这枚小小的戒指可以成为夺人性命的武器。

languages.text: Un augmétique en forme de bague dissimulant une minuscule aiguille. Un accessoire de toute beauté capable donc de se transformer en arme létale.
languages.original_text: An exquisite ring augmetic that conceals the tiniest thorn-like blade within. Such an accessory could be a lethal weapon in the right hands.

traits.locale_text: Un augmétique en forme de bague dissimulant une minuscule aiguille. Un accessoire de toute beauté capable donc de se transformer en arme létale.

languages.text: Un anillo aumético precioso que esconde en su interior una cuchilla en forma de espina. Este accesorio podría convertirse en un arma letal en las manos adecuadas.
languages.original_text: An exquisite ring augmetic that conceals the tiniest thorn-like blade within. Such an accessory could be a lethal weapon in the right hands.

traits.locale_text: Un anillo aumético precioso que esconde en su interior una cuchilla en forma de espina. Este accesorio podría convertirse en un arma letal si se usa correctamente.

languages.text: Eine exquisite Ring-Augmentation, in der eine winzige, dornenähnliche Klinge verborgen ist. In den richtigen Händen könnte ein solches Accessoire eine tödliche Waffe sein.
languages.original_text: An exquisite ring augmetic that conceals the tiniest thorn-like blade within. Such an accessory could be a lethal weapon in the right hands.

traits.locale_text: Eine exquisite Ring-Augmentation, in der eine winzige, dornenähnliche Klinge verborgen ist. Ein solches Accessoire kann in den richtigen Händen zu einer tödlichen Waffe werden.

languages.text: Bu zarif ogmetik yüzük, bünyesinde incecik bir bıçağı muhafaza ediyor. Doğru ellerde ölümcül bir silah olabilir.
languages.original_text: An exquisite ring augmetic that conceals the tiniest thorn-like blade within. Such an accessory could be a lethal weapon in the right hands.

traits.locale_text: Bu zarif ogmetik yüzük, bünyesinde incecik bir bıçağı muhafaza ediyor. Doğru ellerde ölümcül bir silah olabilir.
